description.EN: Reduces damage while poisoned.
description.CN: 减少中毒状态时所受到的伤害

description.EN: Reduces the duration of paralysis.
description.CN: 缩短麻痹状态的时间

description.EN: Reduces the duration of sleep.
description.CN: 缩短睡眠状态的时间

description.EN: Reduces stun duration.
description.CN: 缩短昏厥状态的时间

description.EN: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.
description.CN: 减轻怪物引发在泥地的行动限制

description.EN: Grants protection against blastblight.
description.CN: 拥有对爆破异常状态的耐性

description.EN: Grants protection against bleeding.
description.CN: 拥有对裂伤状态的耐性

description.EN: Grants protection against Defense Down.
description.CN: 拥有对防御力下降的耐性

description.EN: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.
description.CN: 拥有对大型怪物咆哮的耐性

description.EN: Grants protection against wind pressure.
description.CN: 拥有对风压的耐性

description.EN: Grants protection against ground tremors.
description.CN: 拥有对地面震动的耐性

description.EN: Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.
description.CN: 怪物于身中投射器异臭弹后更容易逃跑

description.EN: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.
description.CN: 使在瘴气之谷中受到的环境伤害减轻、无效

description.EN: Nullifies damage from heat.
description.CN: 使炎暑、热造成的伤害无效

description.EN: Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.
description.CN: 提高玩家的攻击力。等级提高后，也会影响会心率。

description.EN: Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.
description.CN: 提高玩家的防御力。等级提高后，也会影响耐性值。

description.EN: Increases health.
description.CN: 提升玩家的体力

description.EN: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.
description.CN: 提高体力回复时的回复量

description.EN: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).
description.CN: 受到伤害时，红色槽部分的回复速度会提高

description.EN: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
description.CN: 提高玩家的火耐性。等级上升后，也会影响防御力。

description.EN: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
description.CN: 提高玩家的水耐性。等级上升后，也会影响防御力。

description.EN: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
description.CN: 提高玩家的冰耐性。等级上升后，也会影响防御力。

description.EN: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
description.CN: 提高玩家的雷耐性。等级上升后，也会影响防御力。

description.EN: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
description.CN: 提高玩家的龙耐性。等级上升后，也会影响防御力。

description.EN: Grants protection against all elemental blights.
description.CN: 拥有对全部属性异常状态的耐性

description.EN: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化火属性之力。（武器属性值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化水属性之力。（武器属性值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has as maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化冰属性之力。（武器属性值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化雷属性之力。（武器属性值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化龙属性之力。（武器属性值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化毒素累积值。（武器累积值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化麻痹累积值。（武器累积值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Elemental buildup has maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化睡眠累积值。（武器累积值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases the rate of the blast buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
description.CN: 强化爆破累积值。（武器累积值的强化，有其上限）

description.EN: Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.
description.CN: 提高弩炮通常弹或弓的通常箭的攻击力。

description.EN: Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.
description.CN: 提高弩炮贯通弹或是弓龙之箭的攻击力。

description.EN: Increases the attack power of spread ammo, power shot arrows, and Thousand Dragons.
description.CN: 提高弩枪散弹或是弓的刚射、龙之千矢的攻击力。

description.EN: Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)
description.CN: 解锁武器的隐藏属性。增加轻弩炮的装填数。（装填数有其上限）

description.EN: Increases affinity.
description.CN: 会心率提升

description.EN: Increases the damage of critical hits.
description.CN: 增加会心攻击的伤害

description.EN: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.
description.CN: 攻击怪物时，若攻击对该部位颇有效的话，会心率则会上升。

description.EN: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.
description.CN: 加快提升太刀、双剑、剑斧、盾斧的槽及大剑、大锤、弓的蓄力速度。

description.EN: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.
description.CN: 以太刀、双剑、操虫棍、剑斧、盾斧发动，增长强化状态的持续时间。

description.EN: Extends the weapon sharpness gauage. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.
description.CN: 延长武器锐利度的槽。但锐利度的槽不会超过上限。

description.EN: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.
description.CN: 武器拔刀攻击的会心率提高。

description.EN: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.
description.CN: 更容易破环大型怪物的部位

description.EN: Makes it easier to stun monsters.
description.CN: 更容易让怪物陷入昏厥状态

description.EN: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.
description.CN: 特定攻击所拥有的，提高怪物疲劳的效果

description.EN: Makes it easier to mount monsters.
description.CN: 更容易骑乘怪物

description.EN: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.
description.CN: 强化跳跃攻击

description.EN: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.
description.CN: 满足特定条件后，一定时间内会提高会心率，减轻固定消耗耐力行动的消费量

description.EN: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.
description.CN: 若战斗中的大型怪物发怒，即会提高攻击力与会心率。

description.EN: Increases attack when your health is full.
description.CN: 体力全满时，攻击力提高

description.EN: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
description.CN: 体力在最大值的35%以下时，防御力与攻击力会提高。

description.EN: Temporarily increases your attack and defense every time you faint up to 2 times.
description.CN: 每次体力耗尽时，攻击力与防御力就会上升一定时间。（最多2次）

description.EN: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).
description.CN: 体力槽残留有红色部分的期间，攻击力上升

description.EN: Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.
description.CN: 处于异常状态时，提高回避性能并减少耐力消耗量

description.EN: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.
description.CN: 延长狩猎笛旋律效果持续时间

description.EN: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
description.CN: 增加铳枪的炮击装填数与盾斧的瓶装填数

description.EN: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.
description.CN: 提升弩枪的特殊弹药与弓的龙之箭、龙之千矢威力

description.EN: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.
description.CN: 铳枪的炮击、龙击炮、盾斧的瓶攻击、穿甲榴弹等随着爆炸，攻击的威力也会上升

description.EN: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.
description.CN: 提升弩炮、大炮的威力

description.EN: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).
description.CN: 进行冲刺等等渐渐消耗耐力的行动时，所需要的耐力消耗量减低。

description.EN: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.
description.CN: 进行回避等等固定消耗耐力的行动时，所需要的耐力消耗量减低。

description.EN: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.
description.CN: 可以向着大型怪物进行飞扑回避。同时会延长飞跃距离

description.EN: Speeds up stamina recovery.
description.CN: 加快耐力的回复速度

description.EN: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time. However, does not work against cold environments that reduce stamina.
description.CN: 可抑制耐力槽最大值随着时间经过的减少，但无法抑制因寒冷导致的减少。

description.EN: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.
description.CN: 延长回避时的无敌时间

description.EN: Increases evade distance.
description.CN: 延长回避时的移动距离

description.EN: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.
description.CN: 防御时不易硬直，并减轻耐力的消耗

description.EN: Speeds up weapon sheathing.
description.CN: 加快收起武器的速度

description.EN: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.
description.CN: 使用部分道具时的效果，对在一定范围内的同伴也会有作用。

description.EN: Extends the duration of some item effects.
description.CN: 延长部分道具的效果时间

description.EN: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.
description.CN: 食用、饮用类的道具有一定的几率可再次使用

description.EN: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.
description.CN: 加快食用肉及道具的速度

description.EN: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.
description.CN: 缩短砥石的使用时间

description.EN: Increases the damage of explosive items.
description.CN: 提高爆弹系道具的伤害

description.EN: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.
description.CN: 平时无法食用的蘑菇，现在可口了。也因此能取得有效的效果。

description.EN: Improves your skill at fishing.
description.CN: 变得擅长钓鱼的技能

description.EN: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.
description.CN: 搬运时的移动速度会上升，且即使从某种程度的高度往下跳，搬运的物品也不会掉落。

description.EN: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.
description.CN: 采集行动的速度加快，行动中即使遭到攻击，也不会硬直。

description.EN: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.
description.CN: 增加在原野采集蜂蜜的取得数

description.EN: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.
description.CN: 剥取中即使遭到攻击，也不会硬直

description.EN: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.
description.CN: 一定几率减少玩家受到的伤害

description.EN: Powers up Palicoes.
description.CN: 强化随从的攻击力与防御力

description.EN: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.
description.CN: 增加药草等、消耗道具的取得数

description.EN: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.
description.CN: 增加采集点的采集次数

description.EN: Increases affinity as long as stamina is kept full for a period of time.
description.CN: 维持耐力计量表全满状态一段时间后，会心率会上升

description.EN: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.
description.CN: 增加在原野取得之投射器的弹药装填数。利用投射器全弹发射可降低消耗弹药数。

description.EN: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
description.CN: 怪物更容易追丢玩家

description.EN: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.
description.CN: 减轻受到小伤害时的反应

description.EN: Expands your scoutflies' detection range.
description.CN: 扩大导虫的反应范围

description.EN: Increases movement speed while crouching.
description.CN: 加快蹲下时的移动速度

description.EN: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.
description.CN: 跳跃中即使遭到攻击，也不会硬直。

description.EN: Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables like Sporepuffs or Wiggly Litchi.
description.CN: 使用棉花孢子草和冰耐草等可任意发动效果的环境作物时，能够追加回复体力。

description.EN: Lets you move more freely in water. Also prevents you from being slowed down by terrain effects, such as deep snow.
description.CN: 适应水中环境并可在水中行动。此外，也能适应深雪处等因地形导致移动速度迟缓的区域。

description.EN: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy, or when moving while grappling onto an enemy.
description.CN: 攀附在壁面或藤蔓进行回避时，或是飞翔爪中进行移动时，消耗的耐力会减少。

description.EN: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.
description.CN: 发动的闪光更容易生效

description.EN: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)
description.CN: 更容易调查及研究大型怪物。（会在结算时出现效果）

description.EN: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.
description.CN: 以攻击讨伐昆虫型的小型怪物时，更容易在剥取状态下残留。

description.EN: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.
description.CN: 拥有对瘴气侵蚀状态的耐性

description.EN: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.
description.CN: 减少要将导虫诱导至大型怪物前，所需的痕迹数量。

description.EN: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.
description.CN: 提高活性化的采集点的发生率

description.EN: Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.
description.CN: 可通过生态地图了解活性化的采集点

description.EN: Improves your skill at cooking meat.
description.CN: 变得擅于烤肉的技能

description.EN: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.
description.CN: 缩短特殊装备可再次使用的间隔时间

description.EN: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.
description.CN: 进行滑行后，一定时间内会心率会上升。

description.EN: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)
description.CN: 即使被小型怪物发现也不容易进入战斗状态。（对甲虫种等部分怪物无效）

description.EN: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.
description.CN: 若持续攻击命中怪物，便能恢复体力。恢复量会依武器种类不同而有所变动。

description.EN: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.
description.CN: 体力在达到槽的最大值前会持续自动回复

description.EN: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.
description.CN: 提高对怪物施毒的效果时间

description.EN: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.
description.CN: 体力降低至40%以下时，一定时间内耐力的消耗量会减少

description.EN: Increases stamina cap.
description.CN: 增加耐力的上限值

description.EN: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
description.CN: 因攻击而出现会心攻击时，所造成的属性伤害（火、水、雷、冰、龙）会提高

description.EN: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.
description.CN:
攻击不会被弹开。
/缩短弹药、箭矢达到最大威力时的距离。

description.EN: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.
description.CN: 锐利度愈差攻击力愈高。远距离武器的近身攻击威力与使敌人昏厥的容易度有大幅提升。

description.EN: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.
description.CN: 强化装备中的无属性武器

description.EN: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
description.CN: 捕获取得的报酬数量变多的几率很高。（从任务中途使用不会有效果）

description.EN: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.
description.CN: 可以防御一般无法防御的攻击

description.EN: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).
description.CN: 当体力在一定程度以上时，即使承受了超过这部分体力的伤害，也能撑住而不精疲力尽一次。

description.EN: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.
description.CN: 发生会心攻击时，不会消耗锐利度。

description.EN: Negates all wind pressure.
description.CN: 使全部的风压无效

description.EN: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.
description.CN:
锐利度的消耗降低一半。
/低概率不消耗弩炮的弹药及弓的瓶发射。

description.EN: Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.
description.CN: 因攻击而出现会心时，所造成的状态异常值（麻痹、毒、睡眠、爆破）会提高。

description.EN: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
description.CN: 完成任务获得的报酬数量容易变多。（从任务中途开始使用不会有效果）

description.EN: Increases max bow charge level by one.
description.CN: 弓的蓄力阶段增加一个阶段

description.EN: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.
description.CN: 追加、强化武器拔刀攻击所引起的昏厥的能力，攻击力也会小幅提升。

description.EN: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.
description.CN: 研磨武器后，一定时间内锐利度不会降低。

description.EN: Allows you to apply poison coatings.
description.CN: 装备弓时，可以装备毒瓶。

description.EN: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.
description.CN: 装备弓时，可装备麻痹瓶。

description.EN: Allows you to apply sleep coatings.
description.CN: 装备弓时，可装备睡眠瓶。

description.EN: Allows you to apply blast coatings.
description.CN: 装备弓时，可装备爆破瓶。

description.EN: Increases the Elderseal of weapons and dragon ammo.
description.CN: 强化武器与灭龙弹所持有的龙封力。

description.EN: High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
description.CN: 完成任务获得的报酬数量容变多的几率很高。（从任务中途开始使用不会有效果）

description.EN: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
description.CN: 剥取次数增加一次。（从任务中途开始使用不会有效果）

description.EN: Elemental damage increased for jumping attacks.
description.CN: 跳跃攻击的属性伤害提升

description.EN: Only those who complete the rigorous witcher training are allowed to use the powerful magic of the Igni Sign.
Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.
description.CN: 抓准时机防御成功的话，会提升一定时间的攻击力。

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Bombardier skill.
description.CN: 解放炸弹客技能的等级上限

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Slinger Capacity skill.
description.CN: 解放投射器装填数提升技能等级上限

description.EN: Greatly increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
description.CN: 大幅提升会心攻击产生时造成的属性伤害（火、水、雷、冰、龙）

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Divine Blessing skill.
description.CN: 解放精灵加护技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Greatly increases status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.
description.CN: 大幅提升会心攻击产生时造成的状态异常值（麻痹、毒、睡眠、爆破）。

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Latent Power skill.
description.CN: 解放力量解放技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Artillery skill.
description.CN: 解放炮术技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal status.
description.CN: 解除状态异常或属性异常状态属性后，会强化一定时间的攻击性能。

description.EN: While wearing a mantle, gain Windproof Lv3, Earplugs Lv3, Tremor Res Lv3, and Flinch Free.
description.CN: 装备衣装时，可获得耐震等级3、风压耐性等级3、耳塞等级3胆怯无效之效果。

description.EN: While wearing a mantle, gain Tremor Resistance Lv3, Earplugs Lv5, max Windproof, and Flinch Free.
description.CN: 装备衣装时，可获得耐震等级3、耳塞等级5、风压完全无效、胆怯无效之效果。

description.EN: Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv2 and increases elemental damage.
description.CN: 若持续攻击命中怪物，会发动一定时间的属性解放/装弹扩充等级2。属性攻击力也会少量提升。

description.EN: Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv3 and increases elemental damage.
description.CN: 若持续攻击命中怪物，会发动一定时间的属性解放/装弹扩充等级3。属性攻击力也会提升。

description.EN: An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. Wanes each melee hit or shot fired.
description.CN: 纳刀状态下，会慢慢积累寒气，强化攻击力。当近身攻击击中时或发射箭·弹药时，寒气会逐渐丧失。

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Stamina Thief skill.
description.CN: 解放夺取耐力技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Free Meal skill.
description.CN: 解放满足感技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Agitator skill.
description.CN: 解放挑战者技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Slugger skill to 5.
description.CN: 解放精神抖擞技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Greatly reduces sharpness loss. Bows and bowguns have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.
description.CN:
锐利度的消耗大幅降低。
/提升不需要消费弩枪弹药及弓的瓶即可发射的几率。

description.EN: Raises  the maximum level of the Maximum Might skill.
description.CN: 解放击晕术技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Raises the maximum level of the Tool Specialist skill.
description.CN: 解放整备技能的等级上限。

description.EN: Prevents zombie and effluvial buildup.
description.CN: 不会受瘴气侵蚀的影响，也不会变成丧尸状态。

description.EN: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.
Allows you to quickly recover from heavy attacks that blow you back when you have your weapon unsheathed.
Nullifies the effects of cold weather.
description.CN: 使寒冷的影响无效

description.EN: Elem., abnormal status, & affinity up with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.
description.CN: 拔刀状态下，属性、状态异常值、会心率上升。攻击时仍会受到伤害，但持续攻击就能发挥自动回复效果。

description.EN: Enhances attacks even more with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.
description.CN: 进一步提升拔刀状态中的攻击性能。攻击时虽然仍会受到伤害，但只要持续攻击，就能发挥自动回复效果。

description.EN: Increases defense and eliminates damage reactions. Taking several hits knoocks it out, but reactivates over time.
Greatly increases odds of getting special Grand Appreciation rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Increases odds of getting special Grand Appreciation rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Greatly increases odds of getting special Holiday Joy rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Increases odds of getting special Holiday Joy rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Raises the maximum level of the Heroics skill.
Increases odds of getting special Full Bloom rewards.
Greatly increases odds of getting special Full Bloom rewards.
